title: The Unity of Mercy and Justice
author: Moftah, Iryan
description: This manuscript, entitled Al-Rahmah wal Adl Talaqiyyan, is a dissertation on the divine justice and mercy of God according to Coptic Orthodox Church dogma. It describes the book of Genesis.
subject-lcsh: Apocryphal books (Old Testament); Creation; Coptic church
